languages.text: Вольный Торговец создал{mf||a} дискуссионную группу для теологических споров, что отвлекает монахов от трудов.
The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец создал{mf||a} дискуссионную группу для теологических споров, что отвлекает монахов от трудов.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to form a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
The Rogue Trader ordered to form a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

The Rogue Trader ordered to form a debate group with members from both the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer for theological disputes, which had the unfortunate side effect of distracting them from their duties.
The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a donné l'ordre de former un groupe pour débattre de sujets théologiques, ce qui a eu le regrettable effet de détourner les moines de leurs devoirs.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a donné l'ordre de former un groupe pour débattre de sujets théologiques, ce qui a eu le regrettable effet de détourner les moines de leurs devoirs.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは神学論争のための討論グループの結成を命じた。これは結果的に、修道士たちの職務から注意をそらした。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは神学論争のための討論グループの結成を命じた。これは結果的に、修道士たちの職務から注意をそらした。

languages.text: 行商浪人命令双方结成辩论小组，以解决神学争端，但这造成了一定程度的不良影响，双方成员都不再专注于其本职工作。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人命令双方结成辩论小组，以解决神学争端，但这造成了一定程度的不良影响，双方成员都不再专注于其本职工作。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó formar un grupo de debate para disputas teológicas, lo que también distrajo a los monjes de sus obligaciones.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó formar un grupo de debate para disputas teológicas, lo que también distrajo a los monjes de sus obligaciones.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, eine theologische Diskussionsgruppe zu bilden. Das hatte den unerwünschten Nebeneffekt, dass die Mönche von ihren Pflichten abgelenkt wurden.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, eine theologische Diskussionsgruppe zu bilden. Das hatte den unerwünschten Nebeneffekt, dass die Mönche von ihren Pflichten abgelenkt wurden.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, teolojik tartışmalar için bir münazara grubu oluşturulmasını emretti. Bu da keşişlerin dikkatini vazifelerine verememelerine sebep oldu.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered the formation of a debate group for theological disputes, which had the side effect of distracting the monks from their duties.
